title: Top Places to visit in Lakhisarai, Bihar
content:
Lakhisarai (archaic spelling: Luckeesarai) town is the administrative headquarters of Lakhisarai district in the Indian state of Bihar. The town has a population of 99,931 (2011 census).
Lakhisarai district is one of the thirty-eight districts of Bihar state, India, and Lakhisarai town is

title: Top Places to visit in Madhepura, Bihar
content:
Madhepura is a municipality in Madhepura district in the Indian state of Bihar.
Madhepura district is one of the thirty-eight districts of Bihar state, India, and Madhepura town is the administrative headquarters of this district. Madhepura district is a part of Kosi division.

title: Top Places to visit in Madhubani, Bihar
content: Madhubani is a town with municipality in Madhubani district in the Indian state of Bihar. It is the district headquarters. It lies 26 km northeast of Darbhanga town and was part of the erstwhile 'Bettiah Raj'. Internal disputes and family quarrels divided the Bettiah Raj in course of time. The Ma

title: Top Places to visit in Muzaffarpur, Bihar
Top Places to visit in Nalanda (Bihar Sharif), Bihar
content: Nalanda was a Mahavihara, a large Buddhist monastery, in the ancient kingdom of Magadha (modern-day Bihar) in India. The site is located about 95 kilometres (59 mi) southeast of Patna near the city of Bihar Sharif, and was a centre of learning from the fifth century CE to c. 1200 CE. It is a UNES

title: Top Places to visit in Patna, Bihar
content: Patna is the capital and largest city of the state of Bihar in India. Patna is the second-largest city in eastern India after Kolkata.[9][page needed]It had an estimated city population of 1.68 million in 2011, making it the 19th largest city in India. title: Top Places to visit in Purnia, Bihar
content: Purnia is a city that serves as the administrative headquarters of both Purnia district and Purnia division in the Indian state of Bihar. It is the largest city in northeastern Bihar also known as Kosi- Seemanchal area.[citation needed] Total geographical area of Purnia municipal corporation is 9

Top Places to visit in Saharsa, Bihar
content: Saharsa is a city and a municipality in the Saharsa district in the eastern part of the state of Bihar, India. It is situated near the eastern banks of the Kosi River. It serves as the administrative headquarters for Saharsa District and is also the capital (Divisional Headquarter) of the Kosi Di

title: Top Places to visit in Samastipur, Bihar
content:
Samastipur is a city and a municipality (nagar parishad) in Bihar, India. It is the headquarters of Samastipur district. The Burhi Gandak River flows through the town.There is a railway junction in the town SPJ. and many other sub stations.

title: Top Places to visit in Saran (Chhapra), Bihar
content:
Saran District is one of the thirty-eight districts of Bihar state, India. The district, part of Saran Division, is also known as Chhapra district after the headquarters of the district, Chhapra.

title: Top Places to visit in Sheikhpura, Bihar
content:
Sheikhpura is a city and a municipality in Sheikhpura district in the Indian state of Bihar. Sheikhpura is also an administrative headquarter of Sheikhpura district.
